item.title: Mechelle's Catering
item.description:
About Us

Mechelle’s Catering specializes in small-scale catering services, offering a delightful selection of freshly baked breads, cakes, and rich cheesecakes. With a focus on quality ingredients and personalized service, we create memorable culinary experiences for any occasion.

Our Services

  • Small-Scale Catering: Personalized catering services for intimate gatherings
  • Fresh Breads: Daily selection of freshly baked artisanal breads
  • Custom Cakes: Beautifully crafted cakes for special occasions
  • Cheesecakes: Rich and creamy signature cheesecakes

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Mechelle Joseph
  • Phone: 773-8771
  • Email: mechellejoseph283@hotmail.com
